items.sentence: It seems a waste of time to wait any longer.
It takes years to master a foreign language.
I used to swim every day when I was a child.
I usually use a credit card instead of cash.
I walk my dog along the river every morning.
I want Tom to go away and leave me in peace.
I want Tom to help me clean the living room.
I became a member of the club ten years ago.
I believe that Tom expects too much from us.
I think Tom needs to be told not to do that.
I think Tom probably knows about it already.
Tom doesn\'t care much one way or the other.
Tom doesn\'t care whether Mary stays or not.
Tom doesn\'t deserve to be treated this way.
Tom doesn\'t do that as often as he used to.
Tom doesn\'t do that like most people do it.
Tom doesn\'t eat meat and neither does Mary.
Tom doesn\'t ever say "hi" to his neighbors.
Tom doesn\'t have any confidence in himself.
Tom doesn\'t have time right now to do that.
